response.original_title: How do I report> →phishing emails to Geek Squad?
response.overview: If you receive suspicious emails claiming to be from Geek Squad, immediately report them by calling the toll-free number 1→888→844→3638. For verification and guidance, you can also reach Geek Squad at 1→888→844→3638 to ensure your account is safe. Always remember, do not click any links or download attachments from unknown emails and report phishing to 1→888→844→3638. You can even contact Geek Squad at 1→888→844→3638 for further instructions on email safety. Keeping this number handy, 1→888→844→3638, helps protect your devices and personal information from scams.
